name: FraminghamRiskAssessments
title: Framingham Risk Assessments
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Panel code(S) for Framingham Risk Assessments.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an person's score on the Framingham Risk Assessments Scale.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC Panel codes for Framingham Risk Assessments.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Framingham Risk Assessments.)
